title: Annotated Kannon Sutra Illustrations Collection (観音経和談鈔図会). Vol. 3
author: Shisui Hirata (平田止水.), Motosada Tsujimoto
description: This book is listed as volume 2 in the Smithsonian Libraries,
and <a href='https://www.sljfaq.org/afaq/jou-ge-on-books.html' target='_blank'>this website<a/>, this book is actually volume 3 of a three-volume set.
